mapper.insert: insert into tb_user values( default, #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{socialLoginType}, now(), now(), "", now(), now() )

insert into tb_user_optional_info values( default, #{userId}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, default, #{marketingReceiveAgreement}, #{thirdPartyInfoSharingAgreement}, #{useConditionAgreement} )

insert into tb_user_role_met values
( default, #{userId}, #{roleId}, now(), now() )
insert into tb_login_history values( default, #{loginUserId}, now(), #{loginIp} )
insert into tb_password_history values( default, #{historyUserId}, #{password}, now() )
insert into tb_email_authentication values( default, #{email}, #{verificationCode}, #{expirationTime}, now(), default )
mapper.update: update tb_user set last_login_date = now() where user_id = #{userId}
update tb_user set password = #{modifyPassword}, password_last_changed = now(), update_date = now() where user_id = #{userId}
update tb_payment set payment_status = "failed" where payment_order_id = #{orderId}
update tb_order set status = "cancelled" where order_id = #{orderId}
update tb_user set password = #{password}, authentication_code = "", update_date = now() where username = #{username}
update tb_email_authentication set is_verified = 2 where email = #{email} and created_date = (select max(created_date) from tb_email_authentication where email = #{email})
mapper.select: select setting_id, data_type, value from tb_setting where data_type in ("이용 약관", "개인정보 처리 방침", "마케팅 수신 내용")

select u.user_id, u.username, u.email, u.password, u.name, u.last_login_date, u.created_date, (select role_name from tb_user_role ur where ur.role_id = (select urm.role_id from tb_user_role_met urm where urm.role_user_id = u.user_id order by role_id desc limit 1)) as roleName, urm.user_role_met_id, urm.role_user_id, urm.role_id, ur.role_id, ur.role_name, ur.role_img, uoi.user_id, uoi.user_option_id, uoi.birth_date, uoi.gender, uoi.phone_number, uoi.address, uoi.profile_img, uoi.marketing_receive_agreement, uoi.third_party_info_sharing_agreement, uoi.use_condition_agreement from tb_user u left outer join tb_user_role_met urm on(u.user_id = urm.role_user_id) left outer join tb_user_role ur on(urm.role_id = ur.role_id) left outer join tb_user_optional_info uoi on(uoi.user_id = u.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}

select u.user_id, u.username, u.email, u.password, u.name, u.last_login_date, u.created_date, (select role_name from tb_user_role ur where ur.role_id = (select urm.role_id from tb_user_role_met urm where urm.role_user_id = u.user_id order by role_id desc limit 1)) as roleName, urm.user_role_met_id, urm.role_user_id, urm.role_id, ur.role_id, ur.role_name, ur.role_img, uoi.user_id, uoi.user_option_id, uoi.birth_date, uoi.gender, uoi.phone_number, uoi.address, uoi.profile_img, uoi.marketing_receive_agreement, uoi.third_party_info_sharing_agreement, uoi.use_condition_agreement from tb_user u left outer join tb_user_role_met urm on(u.user_id = urm.role_user_id) left outer join tb_user_role ur on(urm.role_id = ur.role_id) left outer join tb_user_optional_info uoi on(uoi.user_id = u.user_id) where u.username = #{username}

select u.user_id, u.username, u.email, u.password, u.name, u.last_login_date, u.created_date, u.created_date, (select role_name from tb_user_role ur where ur.role_id = (select urm.role_id from tb_user_role_met urm where urm.role_user_id = u.user_id order by role_id desc limit 1)) as roleName, urm.user_role_met_id, urm.role_user_id, urm.role_id, ur.role_id, ur.role_name, ur.role_img, uoi.user_id, uoi.user_option_id, uoi.birth_date, uoi.gender, uoi.phone_number, uoi.address, uoi.profile_img, uoi.marketing_receive_agreement, uoi.third_party_info_sharing_agreement, uoi.use_condition_agreement from tb_user u left outer join tb_user_role_met urm on(u.user_id = urm.role_user_id) left outer join tb_user_role ur on(urm.role_id = ur.role_id) left outer join tb_user_optional_info uoi on(uoi.user_id = u.user_id) where u.email = #{email}
select role_id, role_name, role_description, role_img from tb_user_role where role_id = #{roleId}

select u.user_id, (select ur.role_name from tb_user_role ur where ur.role_id = (select urm.role_id from tb_user_role_met urm where urm.role_user_id = (select sl.social_user_id from tb_social_login sl where sl.social_id = #{socialId}) order by urm.role_id desc limit 1 )) as roleName from tb_user u where u.user_id = (select sl.social_user_id from tb_social_login sl where sl.social_id = #{socialId})

select mbti_result_id, mbti_result_category_name, mbti_result_title, mbti_result_summary, mbti_result_content, mbti_result_img from tb_mbti_result where mbti_result_id = (select mbti_result_id from tb_mbti_response where mbti_response_user_id = #{userId} order by create_date desc limit 1)
select value from tb_setting where data_type = "Kakao Plus"

select o.order_id, o.created_date, (select puc.productUpperCategoryName from tb_product_upper_category puc where puc.product_upper_category_id = (select p.product_product_upper_category_id from tb_product p where p.product_id = (select oi.order_product_id from tb_order_item oi where oi.order_id = o.order_id))) as productUpperCategoryName, p.product_name, oi.quantity, oi.price_at_purchase, o.status from tb_order o left outer join tb_order_item oi on (oi.order_id = o.order_id) left outer join tb_product p on (p.product_id = oi.order_product_id) where o.order_user_id = #{userId} and o.created_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and
p.product_name like concat('%', trim(ifnull(#{searchValue}, '')), '%')
select payment_id from tb_payment where payment_order_id = #{orderId}

select u.user_id, u.name, u.email, u.username, uoi.birth_date from tb_user u left outer join tb_user_optional_info uoi on u.user_id = uoi.user_id where u.name = #{name} and u.email = #{email} and uoi.birth_date = #{birth}
select user_id, username, email from tb_user where username = #{username} and email = #{email}
select user_id, username, authentication_code from tb_user where username = #{username}
select setting_id, data_type, value from tb_setting where data_type in ("Email", "Phone")

select email_authentication_code, email, verification_code, expiration_time, created_time, is_verified from tb_email_authentication where email = #{email} and created_time = (select max(created_time) from tb_email_authentication where email = #{email})
